title: print.css
content: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300); body { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: #fff; font-family:'Trebuchet MS', 'Lucida Console', sans-serif; color:#7b7b7b; font-size:15px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing:1px; } img { border: 0px; } .sprites { background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image: url(imweb-sprites.png); } .hheader { background-position:0px -270px;width:1000px;height:135px; margin: 15px 0px 5px 7px; font-size: 0px; } .header { background-position:0px -517px;width:1000px;height:135px; margin: 15px 0px 5px 7px; font-size: 0px; } .imweb-logo-print { display: inline-block; padding-left: 20px; } .hrs-ds { display: none; } .header a { height: 70px; display: block; text-decoration: none; } .box { width: 1014px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; position: relative } .boxoben { background-image: none; } .boxmitte { background-image: none; padding-top: 9px; } .inhalt { padding: 16px 23px 9px 23px; text-align: justify } .boxunten { background-image: none;width:1014px;height:14px; } .hrefbutton { color: #7B7B7B !important; display: block; } .abbrechen, .speichern, .normalbutton, .klick, .loginbutton { background: url("icon-schliessen.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 3px #FFFFFF !important; border: 1px solid #DBDBDB !important; border-radius: 23px 23px 23px 23px !important; color: #7B7B7B !important; font-size: 11px !important; height: 23px !important; line-height: 22px !important; overflow: hidden !important; padding: 1px 12px 1px 25px !important; text-decoration: none !important; } .formbutton { padding: 0px 12px 1px 25px !important; } .normalbutton, .klick { background: url("icon-buttonnormal.png") no-repeat scroll 4px 4px #FFFFFF !important; margin-right: 10px; } .buttonrechts { float: right; margin:0px 10px 0px 0px!important; } .floatright { float: right; } .speichern { background:#B0D2F3 url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 3px!important; } .speichern-mini { background:#ccebff url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 3px!important; } .loginbutton { background:#fff url('icon-speichern.png') no-repeat 4px 4px!important; font-weight: bold; } .buttonbar { display: none; } .clear { clear: both; height: 0px; width: 0px; font-size: 0px; } .slogan { padding: 60px 60px 0px 60px; text-align: center; font-size: 28px; } .zitat { padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 60px; padding-right: 60px; font-size:13px; text-align: right; } .inhalt a { color:#5964CB; } .inhalt a:hover { color: #182CEA; } .inhalt a:visited { color: #686666; } .textblockgross { margin-top:40px; } .textblockgross h1, .gutter h1, .gutter-login h1 { font-size:18px; margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 7px 25px; border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e8e8; background-position:left -422px; } h1.punkt-mini { background-position:left -499px!important; } .trenner { margin: 10px 0px 10px 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: #e7e8e8; height: 1px; font-size: 0px; } .textblockgross h3 { font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin: 0px 0px 10px 0px; } .bildlinks { float: left; padding-right: 18px; } .bildrechts { float: right; padding-left: 18px; } .mehrlink { float: right; font-size: 11px !important; color: #7b7b7b!important; text-decoration: none; display: block; background-position:-994px -224px; padding:1px 0px 2px 25px; margin-top:3px; text-decoration: underline; } *+html .mehrlink { margin-top: -25px; } .mehrlink:hover { color:#636363!important; } .gutter { width: 470px; float: left; margin-top:40px; } .fuss { width: 1014px; margin:10px auto 10px auto; position: relative; text-align: center; font-size:11px; } .fuss a { text-decoration: none; color:#7b7b7b; } .q-deutschland { padding-top: 25px; border:0px; } /* ###### navig ####### */ .navig { display: none; } /* navig ende ---------- */ /* ########## hinweise no java ########## */ .achtungjava { background-color:#ff6d03; left: 160px; top:210px; height:110px; width:700px; position: absolute; color:#fff; z-index:48; border:2px solid #979393; font-size:13pt; background:#ff6d03 url(browser-info.jpg) no-repeat 13px 50%; } .browser { background-color:#ff6d03; left: 160px; top:350px; height:110px; width:700px; position: absolute; color:#fff; z-index:48; border:2px solid #979393; font-size:13pt; background:#ff6d03 url(browser-info.jpg) no-repeat 13px 50%; } .browser div { padding:0px 0px 0px 125px; border:0px solid #0f0; margin:10px 0px 0px 0px } .achtungjava div { padding:0px 0px 0px 125px; border:0px solid #0f0; margin:22px 0px 0px 0px } /* ########## hinweise no java ########## ENDE */ .bildmitte { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; margin-bottom: 15px; } /* ########## buchungsteaser ########## */ .sbar { display:inline; } .usbar { display:none; } #bkteaser { width:968px; white-space:nowrap; margin:0px; margin-top:-5px; } #bkteaser fieldset { border: 0px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; } #bkteaser .searchbtn { width:100%; } #bkteaser .detailsearch{ text-align:center; width:100%; margin-top:5px; } #bkteaser .title { display:block; margin:-2px 0px 2px 0px; padding:0; font-weight:bold; } #bkteaser .blockeins { white-space:nowrap; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:6px 0px 6px 6px; width:470px; float: left; } .bkanreise { margin-right: 11px!important; } #bkteaser .pers { margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:3px 0px 6px 6px; float: left; width:470px; } #bkteaser .kind { margin:0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:3px 0px 6px 6px; width:470px; float:right; } #bkteaser .kinder { white-space:nowrap; margin:11px 0px 0px 0px; border:1px solid #E9E9E9; background-color:#FAFAFA; padding:6px 0px 6px 6px; width:470px; float:left; } #bkteaser .adult { width:150px; } #bkteaser .child { width:150px; } #kinder { float:left; } #bkteaser .regio { margin-top:11px !important; width: 960px; } #bkteaser .senden { padding:11px 0px 0px 0px; clear:both; } #bkteaser .senden input { border:0;margin-top:0px;height:31px; } .teasersubmit { border:1px solid #f67929!important; height:30px!important; background:#fff0e4 url('buchungsmaske-button-hg.jpg') repeat-x 0px 0px; color:#fff; width: 100%; } /* ########## buchungsteaser ende ########## */ .anmelden { width: 140px; float: left; text-align: right; padding-right:18px; margin-bottom:10px; } .start-premiumvertrieb { width: 100%; margin-top: 18px; } .premiumvertrieb-logo { height: 102px; width: 250px; float: left; margin-bottom: 16px; } .premiumvertrieb-logo img { border: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .premiumvertrieb-name { height: 102px; line-height: 102px; width: 700px; float: right; margin-bottom: 16px; } /* anmelden */ .pflicht { background-color: #C81D1D; border-radius: 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em; color: #FFFFFF; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0.6em; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000000; } #rot { border: 1px solid red !important; } .fromabstand { margin-bottom:10px; } #pflichtbox { margin-top:50%; } #pflichtboxx { margin-top:50%; } .pflicht { margin-bottom:10px;background-color:#C81D1D;padding:0.6em;color:#FFFFFF; border-radius: 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000; } .ok { margin-bottom:10px;background-color:#307828;padding:0.6em;color:#FFFFFF;font-weight:bold; border-radius: 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em 0.6em; text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #000; } legend { padding-bottom:3px; float:left; width: 212px; text-align: right; margin-right: 15px; } fieldset { border: 0px solid #dadada; } .zimmer-login { border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; height: 50px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; } .zimmer-login-border { border-top: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .zimmer-login span { padding-bottom:0px; float:left; width: 90px; margin-right: 40px; font-weight: bold; height: 50px; line-height: 50px; display: block; text-align: right; } .zimmer-login input, .zimmer-login select { background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D1C5C5; color: #7B7B7B; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-weight: normal; margin: 13px 0px 0px 0px; padding: 1px; width: 319px; } .zimmer-login-grau { background-color: #f2f2f2; } .zimmer-login-hellgrau { background-color: #FBFBFB; } .anmelden-senden { width: 100%; height: 30px; } /* seite vor zurueck */ .modulzurueck { display:block;margin-top:15px;padding-left:15px;height:20px;line-height:20px;text-decoration:none;float:left;width:200px; background-position:-6px -457px; } .modulvor { display:block;margin-top:15px;padding-right:15px;height:20px;line-height:20px;text-decoration:none;text-align:right;float:right;width:200px; background-position:right -496px; } .impressum-bildnachweise { width: 265px; margin: 15px 28px 25px 28px; text-align: center; float: left; } .impressum-bildnachweise img { margin-bottom: 5px; } .login-hilfe { display: none; } .grafik-rahmen { border: 1px solid #FFA04D; float: left; margin-right: 18px; } .referenzen-box { bbborder: 1px solid #000; width: 202px; margin: 0px 53px 15px 0px; float: left; } .referenzen-box img { border: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .referenzen-name { display: block; padding: 3px 0px 3px 0px; text-align: center; font-size:11px; } .referenzen-box-ende { margin-right: 0px!important; } .referenzen-box-ende-unten { margin-bottom: 0px!important; } .pfeil-orange { color: #F76F1E; font-size:26px; } .gutter legend { padding-bottom:3px; float:left; width:115px; text-align: right; margin-right: 15px; color:#7b7b7b; } .gutter legend.legendort { padding-bottom:3px; float:left; width:65px; text-align: right; margin-right: 15px; color:#7b7b7b; } .gutter fieldset { border: 0px solid #dadada; margin: 0px; padding: 8px 0px 8px 0px; } .gutter .fieldsetzwei { border: 0px solid #dadada; margin: 0px; padding: 6px 0px 6px 0px; width: 233px; float: left; } .gutter fieldset input { width:320px!important; } .gutter fieldset.fieldsetzwei input { width:88px!important; } .gutter fieldset.fieldsetzwei input.inputort { width:136px!important; } .gutter fieldset.rueckantwort input { width: 30px!important; } *+html .gutter legend { padding-bottom:3px; clear: none; width: 212px; text-align: left; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: -3px; color:#7b7b7b; } .fromabstandgutter { margin-bottom:5px; background-color: #F9F9F9; } .unterkuftanbieten { border: 1px solid #da6c1d !important; padding: 1px 12px 1px 12px !important; background: url("hg-unterkunft.jpg") repeat-x top left #ff8425 !important; color: #fff!important; font-weight: bold; text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #a0531b; } .login-prem-text { text-align:right; margin-top:10px; } .login-prem-mitte { text-align: center; } .login-prem-schrift { font-size: 14px; } .login-prem-oran { color:#EA733B; font-size:14px; } .mitgliedschaften { height: 100px; width: auto; float: left; margin-top: 28px; margin-left: 28px; } .premiumvertrieb-logo img, .premiumvertrieb-img a img { border: 1px solid #E7E8E8; } .premiumvertrieb-img { margin-right:35px; height: 86px; width: 207px; float: left; margin-bottom: 35px; } .premiumvertrieb-img-end { margin-right:0px; } .tp { width: 190px; height: 127px; padding-right: 18px; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-image: url(../bilder/13052016-tp.jpg); } .tp2 { background-position:0px -127px; } .tp3 { background-position:0px -255px; } .tp4 { background-position:0px -2048px; } .tp5 { background-position:0px -383px; } .tp6 { background-position:0px -511px; } .tp7 { background-position:0px -639px; } .tp8 { background-position:0px -767px; } .tp9 { background-position:0px -895px; } .tp10 { background-position:0px -1023px; } .tp11 { background-position:0px -1151px; } .tp12 { background-position:0px -1279px; } .tp13 { background-position:0px -1407px; } .tp14 { background-position:0px -1535px; } .tp15 { background-position:0px -1663px; } .tp16 { background-position:0px -1791px; } .tp17 { background-position:0px -1919px; } .tp18 { background-position:0px -2176px; } .tp19 { background-position:0px -2304px; } .tpspacer { background-position:0px -2432px; } .tp20 { background-position:0px -256px; } .tp21 { background-position:0px -2560px; } .tp22 { background-position:0px -2688px; } .tp23 { background-position:0px -2815px; } .ui-accordion-header { background-position: left -198px; border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; font-size: 16px; margin: 0 0 10px; padding: 0 0 7px 25px; background-image: url("imweb-sprites.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; cursor: pointer; color: #aaa9a9; } .ui-accordion-content-active { border-bottom: 1px solid #E7E8E8; margin-bottom: 6px; } .ui-accordion-header-active, .ui-accordion-header:hover { background-position: left -666px; color:#595959!important; } .accordion-time { float: right; } .ui-accordion-header-active span.accordion-time, .ui-accordion-header span.accordion-time:hover { color:#595959!important; } .facts { padding: 50px 30px 10px 30px; text-align: left; font-size: 20px; color: #9C9E9F; width: 500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } .facts .icon-check { color: #FE7409; padding-right: 7px; } .start-ani-block { display: none; } .facts { padding: 50px 30px 10px 30px; text-align: left; font-size: 17px; color: #9C9E9F; width: 500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } .facts-anmelden { width: 650px; padding: 15px 30px 10px 30px; line-height: 30px; background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); } .facts .icon-check { color: #25588d; padding-right: 7px; } .registrieren { padding-bottom: 10px; width: auto; text-align: center; margin: 0px; color: #FE7409; } .anmelden-hotline-teaser { background-color: #25588d; padding: 20px; margin-top: 148px; color: #fff; font-size: 15px; } .anmelden-hotline-teaser div { font-size: 85px; float: left; padding-bottom: 30px; padding-top: 11px; padding-right: 28px; padding-left: 10px; } .anmelden-hotline-teaser a { color: #fff; } .balken-teaser { background-color: #25588d; padding: 20px; margin-top: 15px; color: #fff; font-size: 15px; margin-right: -33px; margin-left: -33px; } .slogan span { font-size:20px; padding-top: 10px; display: block; } .gutter-login { width: 291px; float: left; margin-top:20px; } .gutter-login-news { width: 612px; } .zimmer-login input, .zimmer-login select { background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D1C5C5; color: #595959; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Console',sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: normal; margin: 13px 0px 0px 0px; padding: 1px; width: 129px; } .login-news-box { font-size: 11px; } .login-news-box li { list-style-type: none; margin: 0; padding: 5px 0 5px 3px; } .info-pool-box { width: 452px; margin-top: 33px; position: relative; padding-top: 43px; float: left; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover; border-radius: 15px; } .info-pool-box-links { margin-right: 30px; } .info-pool-icon { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fe7409; border: 1px solid #c45e0f; border-radius: 95px; width: 95px; height: 95px; line-height: 95px; text-align: center; position: absolute; left: 178px; top:0px; margin-top: -49px; opacity: 0.9; } .info-pool-icon span { font-size: 45px; color: #fff; text-shadow: 1px 1px #c95e0b; } .info-pool-icon span.icon-gauge { line-height: 88px; } .info-pool-box h1 { font-size: 19px; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 30px; } .info-pool-box p { padding: 0px 10px 0px 10px; } .info-pool-box a { } .info-pool-slider { margin-top: 0px; } .info-pool-slider > div { width: 211px; float: left; background-color: #F0F0F0; margin-right: 30px; padding-bottom: 15px; position: relative; padding-top: 55px; margin-top: 70px; border-radius: 15px; } .info-pool-slider-icon { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fe7409; border: 1px solid #c45e0f; border-radius: 95px; width: 95px; height: 95px; line-height: 95px; text-align: center; margin-top: 0px; position: absolute; left: 57px; top:0 px; margin-top: -103px; opacity: 0.9; } .info-pool-slider-icon span { font-size: 45px; color: #fff; text-shadow: 1px 1px #c95e0b; } .info-pool-slider h1 { font-size: 14px; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px; } .info-pool-slider a { margin-right: 66px; } .info-pool-slider a:hover { background-color: #f8f8f8 !important; } .info-pool-slider-icon span.icon-gauge { line-height: 88px; } .info-pool-slider .clear { padding: 0px !important; margin: 0px !important; width: 0px !important; height: 0px !important; background-color: #fff !important; } .info-pool-slider-end { margin-right: 0px !important; } .balken-start { font-size: 14px; height: 50px; padding: 0px; line-height: 50px; text-align: left !important; font-weight: bold; margin-top: 40px; b } .balken-start > .icon { margin-left: 108px; margin-right: 20px; } .balken-start > a, .balken-start > a:hover { color: #fff; } .buttonbar-anmelden-layer { display: none; } /* ######### helper ######### */ .helper-float-left { float: left; } .helper-float-right { float: right; } .clear, .clearr, .clear-premiumvertrieb, .helper-clear { clear: both; height: 0px; width: 0px; font-size: 0px; } .helper-text-center { text-align: center; } /* ######### helper end ######### */ /* ######## Startseite 2015 ######### */ .image-slogan { background-image: url("../bilder/hg-start-15.jpg"); border-radius: 10px; height: 600px; position: relative; width: 934px; } .slogan-1 { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); color: #fff; font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 300; padding: 10px 15px; position: absolute; right: 0px; text-align: right; top: 40px; width: 560px; } .slogan-2 { display: none; } .slogan-1 span, .slogan-2 span { color: #fe7409; font-weight: 400; } .slogan-3 { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); bottom: 40px; color: #fff; font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 300; padding: 10px; position: absolute; right: 0px; text-align: center; width: 290px; } .teaser-block { height: 538px; position: relative; width: 934px; margin-top: 30px; position: relative; background: url("../bilder/welle-hg.jpg") no-repeat 0px 0px; } .teaser-block h2, .iw-h2-vorteil { font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 300; font-size: 24px; margin-top: 0px; text-align: center; padding-bottom:10px; } .iw-h2 { font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-weight: 300; font-size: 24px; margin-top: 0px; text-align: center; padding-bottom:0px; padding-top:0px; } .iw-h2-vorteil { padding-bottom:0px; padding-top:24px; } .vorteil-klein { font-size: 10px; } .teaser-rechts { float:right;width:252px } .start-box-gastgeber a, .start-box-vermittler a, .start-box-pemium-1 a { text-decoration: none; color: #fff !important; } .start-box-gastgeber, .start-box-vermittler { font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; width: 250px; padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px; color: #fff; font-size: 20px; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 20px; background: #22588d; /* Old browsers */ background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #22588d 100%, #60a4e7 0%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#60a4e7), color-stop(100%,#22588d)); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #60a4e7 0%,#22588d 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #60a4e7 0%,#22588d 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #60a4e7 0%,#22588d 100%); /* IE10+ */ background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #60a4e7 0%,#22588d 100%); /* W3C */ filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#60a4e7', endColorstr='#22588d',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */ border: 1px solid #184371; border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 13px 18px -9px rgba(171,171,171,1); -moz-box-shadow: 0px 13px 18px -9px rgba(171,171,171,1); box-shadow: 0px 13px 18px -9px rgba(171,171,171,1); } .start-box-gastgeber:hover, .start-box-vermittler:hover { background: #22588d; /* Old browsers */ background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #22588d 0%, #60a4e7 100%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#22588d), color-stop(100%,#60a4e7)); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #22588d 0%,#60a4e7 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #22588d 0%,#60a4e7 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #22588d 0%,#60a4e7 100%); /* IE10+ */ background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #22588d 0%,#60a4e7 100%); /* W3C */ filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#22588d', endColorstr='#60a4e7',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */ } .start-box-gastgeber { position: absolute; bottom:105px; right: 0px; } .start-box-vermittler { position: absolute; bottom:23px; right: 0px; } .start-box-pemium { font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif; width: 248px; padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px; color: #333; font-size: 13px; text-align: left; padding:20px; background: #F0F0F0; /* Old browsers */ border: 1px solid #e4e4e4; border-radius: 5px; margin-top: 30px; float: left; margin-right: 32px; height: 340px; } .start-box-pemium-end { margin-right: 0px !important; } .vorteil-teaser { text-align: center; font-weight: bold; padding-bottom: 15px; padding-top: 10px; } .vorteil-teaser-ul { margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px 10px 0px 15px!important; } .vorteil-teaser-ul li { padding-bottom: 10px !important; } .vorteil { background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #22588d; border: 1px solid #194878; border-radius: 70px; height: 70px; line-height: 70px; margin-top: -57px !important; margin-left: 88px !important; opacity: 1 !important;
